section.title: description
section.p: The Textile plugin is an implementation of the amazing Textile Humane Web Text Generator. You can see the original at the Textism Textile site.

section.title: installation and setup
section.p: In your plugin.properties file, add the following line:
You may then add "textile" to one of the flavor-based plugin chains. For example:

In your blojsom.properties be sure to add .*textile to the blog-file-extensions value. The textile plugin uses .textile to identify blog entries that should be passed through the plugin for processing, so be sure your entries end with this extension if you want this plugin to work correctly.

section.title: context attributes and types
section.p: No context attributes are made available or used by the Textile plugin.
